name: Cops Vs Robbers: Thief Robbery
description:
Welcome to the serial armed heist of 2020. An intense face off between cops & robbers. The city bank have accumulated a lot of wealth hidden in the secret vault located in the bank basement. plan the grand heist and get to work. Plan every single step very carefully. don't get yourself killed in the action. Deploy the explosives on the vault & crack open the vault to get all the money in the bags and escape. cops vs robbers also offers you to play the cop mode where you can play as a cop and take over the robbers, kill them all and secure the bank. don't let them get away the all the honey.


Features of cops vs robbers: thief robbery
-Amazing third person gun shooting game
-Amazing 3D environment with multiple levels
-Smooth gun shooting controller
-Intense Sound effects
-Thrilling and action packed levels
-Bank robbing and house looting levels
-Special police sniper bonus level
